description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=2/3. Play the game the critics are saying 'surpasses... Bejeweled, Puzzle Bobble and Puzzle Quest' - dealspwn  "Steam Heroes is a definite gem that should be in everyone library" - hemang  "If you love Match 3 games, definitely check this one out" - diygamer  Challenge yourself in this new puzzle strategy game;  includes 12 stages and competitive online play.  It's up to you to save Steam Land!
